trans-unit.source: Contains a list of possible states for the audio input to a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Contiene una lista de posibles estados de la entrada de audio de un motor de reconocimiento de voz.

trans-unit.source: You can obtain the audio input state of the speech recognition engine with the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: Puede obtener el estado de entrada de audio del motor de reconocimiento de voz con el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> y <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> events are raised when the audio input state of a speech recognition engine changes.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> y <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> se generan eventos cuando el estado de un cambios de motor de reconocimiento de voz de entrada de audio.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates an event handler that handles the changing audio state of a speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra un controlador de eventos que controla el estado de audio variaci√≥n de un reconocedor de voz.

trans-unit.source: Receiving silence or non-speech background noise.
trans-unit.target: Recibiendo silencio o ruido de fondo sin voz.
No se procesa la entrada de audio.
